#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar

void scanInt(long long& x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
for(; (c < 48 || c > 57); c = gc());
for(; (c > 47 && c < 58); c = gc())
x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + c - 48;
}

long long arr[100005];
int main()
{
long long t,n,i;
scanInt(t);
while(t--)
{
    scanInt(n);
    for( i=0;i<n;i++)
        scanInt(arr[i]);
    sort(arr,arr+n);
    int i=0;
    long long c=1;
    if(n==1)
    {
        printf("YES\n");
            continue;
    }
    else
        {
            i=0;
            while(i<n && arr[i]<=c)
            {
                c+=arr[i];
                i++;
            }
            if(i==n)
                printf("YES\n");
            else
                printf("NO\n");
        }
    }
return 0;
}
